div.span: We believe elevating where you live is about blending it seamlessly with how you live. We go to great lengths designing amenities and choosing locations that put everything within reach. Where you live, is where you come alive. Welcome to elegant and exquisite home-style apartments for rent at Avalon Studio 4121. You will discover an impressive range of one- and two-bedroom Studio City apartments that will cater to all your needs. All of our apartment rentals are equipped with fantastic features that make entertaining a breeze, such as dimmable lighting throughout, gourmet kitchens with stainless-look appliances and reflective quartz countertops, and dramatic 9-foot ceilings. Upgrade any home to Furnished+ and enjoy the convenience of turnkey living. Our community offers you a great selection of facilities that include gated entry, dry cleaning valet service, vending on-site controlled access garage parking, additional storage and a recreation room with billiards and lounge area complete with a flat-screen TV. The excellent blend of top-of-the-range services and an expert on-site staff makes Avalon Studio 4121 the ideal place to set up your new home in Los Angeles. This is not just apartment living. This is living up. STUDIO CITY APARTMENTS BY AVALON Living within walking distance of great dining, shopping and nightlife is a rarity in the grand scheme of Los Angeles. Avalon Studio 4121 proves to be the exception to the LA norm. Located directly off Ventura Boulevard means delicious dining and boutique shopping are just a few steps away. You can also spend your free time exploring famous attractions such as Disney, NBC, Universal Studios, Beverly Hills and Warner Bros. There is never a dull moment in the sunny state of California! STUDIO CITY APARTMENT COMMUNITY When you move into our Studio City apartments you will enjoy the special benefits of the Avalon Advantage. This amazing program offers a variety of advantages such as flexible lease terms, online rent payment and an incredibly helpful national relocation program. Avalon ensures a comfortable and convenient lifestyle for you and your family. So don't wait a moment longer. So contact us to schedule an appointment and discover the best Studio City apartments in California today!

div.h2: The service. The standards. The life.

a.div: Great service is one of the things we think about most. We start with selecting passionate people. Then we let them put that passion to work. Our people are a vital part of what shapes the character of each Avalon community.

We strive to align our standards with yours, delivering an experience that lives up to them. We know you've put a lot into getting to where you are in life. We believe where you live should reflect that. So we put ourselves into making sure it does.

Effortless. Enjoyable. Truly comfortable living is both. That's why we go out of our way to choose locations and to design amenities that put so much within reach. So you can live easy without even trying.

div.div: Room dimensions, square footage, and features shown on the floor plan drawings are approximate and may vary between individual apartments that have similar layouts. Furniture shown on the floor plan drawings is representative and individual apartments come unfurnished unless specified otherwise. Quoted rent is per month for new move-ins to the community, based on the move-in date selected. Pricing may vary based on lease term. Quoted rent does not including other fees and charges that may be part of your lease (i.e. utilities, parking, etc.). Please contact the community for details. Prior to signing a lease, quoted rent, specials, availability, and other terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. Washington State - We require our own screening and do not accept comprehensive reusable tenant screening reports.

div.p: Curious about the community layout? You can download the community site map here.

div.h2: Only the best for your best life

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Homes fully furnished and connected to give you the lifestyle you deserve. Flexible lease terms for the ultimate convenience.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: See what we do to take pet friendly living to the next level.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: From fitness amenities to resident perks, we offer a variety of spaces and places to help you meet your wellness goals.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Start earning points on rent with our free residents reward program. Use your points for travel, future rent credit, fitness classes, and more.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Pay rent, submit a service request, find policies and more with our convenient online resident portal.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Offering a wealth of resident resources, our Relocation Advantage program assists in making your transition a smooth one.

We go to great lengths designing amenities and choosing locations that put everything within reach. Where you live, is where you come alive. Welcome to elegant and exquisite home-style apartments for rent at Avalon Studio 4121. You will discover an impressive range of one- and two-bedroom Studio City apartments that will cater to all your needs. All of our apartment rentals are equipped with fantastic features that make entertaining a breeze, such as dimmable lighting throughout, gourmet kitchens with stainless-look appliances and reflective quartz countertops, and dramatic 9-foot ceilings. Upgrade any home to Furnished+ and enjoy the convenience of turnkey living. Our community offers you a great selection of facilities that include gated entry, dry cleaning valet service, vending on-site controlled access garage parking, additional storage and a recreation room with billiards and lounge area complete with a flat-screen TV. The excellent blend of top-of-the-range services and an expert on-site staff makes Avalon Studio 4121 the ideal place to set up your new home in Los Angeles. This is not just apartment living. This is living up. STUDIO CITY APARTMENTS BY AVALON Living within walking distance of great dining, shopping and nightlife is a rarity in the grand scheme of Los Angeles. Avalon Studio 4121 proves to be the exception to the LA norm. Located directly off Ventura Boulevard means delicious dining and boutique shopping are just a few steps away. You can also spend your free time exploring famous attractions such as Disney, NBC, Universal Studios, Beverly Hills and Warner Bros. There is never a dull moment in the sunny state of California! STUDIO CITY APARTMENT COMMUNITY When you move into our Studio City apartments you will enjoy the special benefits of the Avalon Advantage. This amazing program offers a variety of advantages such as flexible lease terms, online rent payment and an incredibly helpful national relocation program. Avalon ensures a comfortable and convenient lifestyle for you and your family. So don't wait a moment longer.
